price: Ibliis malee inni warra sujuuda bu’an wajji ta’uu dide.
arabic: إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ أَبَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: illā ib'līsa abā an yakūna maʿa al-sājidīna
